flawed_nl_solution:
Shay is 6 + 13 = <<6+13=19>>19 years old.
James is 19 + 5 = <<19+5=42>>42 years old.
Thomas will be 42 in 42 - 6 = <<42-6=36>>36 years.
James will be 42 + 36 = <<42+36=78>>78 years old.
#### 78

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
